results.byline: By Kevin Williams, Amanda Holpuch and Campbell Robertson
results.title: Gunman Kills 5 Co-Workers at Louisville Bank on Livestream, Police Say
results.abstract: The police did not give a motive for the shooting in the Kentucky city but said that the gunman, who also died, had been a bank employee.

media.caption: At least five people were killed and eight others were injured in a shooting at a bank in downtown Louisville, Ky., on Monday morning, the police said.

results.title: Charges Filed Against Mother of 6-Year-Old Who Shot a Teacher
results.abstract: Prosecutors had previously decided not to charge the boy, a first grader who took the gun to his Newport News, Va., elementary school in January.

media.caption: Richneck Elementary in Newport News, Va., where a 6-year-old student shot and wounded his teacher in January.

results.adx_keywords: Comic Books and Strips;Magazines;Art;Deaths (Obituaries);Cartoons and Cartoonists;Jaffee, Al;Mad Magazine
results.title: Al Jaffee, Inventive Cartoonist at Mad Magazine, Dies at 102
results.abstract: For 55 years he created the fold-in (as opposed to, say, Playboy’s fold-out), giving readers a satirical double-take on whatever was going on in the news or elsewhere.

media.caption: Al Jaffee at work in 2008. In 2007, he won cartooning’s top honor, putting him in the company of Charles M. Schulz, Mort Walker, Gary Larson, Matt Groening and others.

results.adx_keywords: Marriages;Divorce, Separations and Annulments;Hasidism;internal-sub-only;Gottman, John;Gottman, Julie
results.title: The Case for Staying Married to a Spouse You Cannot Stand
results.abstract: It’s worth exploring why, so often, our culture encourages us to run from the ambivalent space between “happy” and “irreconcilable differences.”

results.title: What Do Leaked U.S. Intelligence Reports Say? Here Is a Quick Guide.
results.abstract: Many questions remain about the classified documents that have been dribbling onto the web.

results.byline: By Simon Romero and Desiree Rios
results.title: New Mexico Is Losing a Form of Spanish Spoken Nowhere Else on Earth
results.abstract: A dialect from the state’s earliest Spanish-speaking settlers has endured for over 400 years in the state’s remote mountain villages. But its time may be running out.

media.caption: Visitors at the Sanctuary of Chimayó in the village of Chimayó, N.M.

results.title: Myriam Ullens, 70, Philanthropic Baroness With Disputed Fortune, Dies
results.abstract: She started institutions in Belgium, Nepal and China, including a major museum in Beijing. A stepson was held on charges of shooting her over money.

results.title: Fox News Settles Defamation Case With Venezuelan Businessman
results.abstract: In a letter to a New York judge, the parties said they had reached a settlement in a case related to claims of voter fraud in the 2020 election, but did not disclose the terms.

media.caption: In 2020, a Twitter account run by Fox falsely claimed that the businessman was “the effective ‘COO’ of the election project.”

results.title: Imam Is Stabbed While Leading Prayers at New Jersey Mosque
results.abstract: The man charged in the attack had been sitting among congregants at the mosque in Paterson, N.J., a community member said. Worshipers subdued him, officials said.

media.caption: Outside the Omar Mosque in Paterson, N.J., on Sunday. A man has been charged with attempted murder and other charges in the attack at the mosque.

results.title: ‘I’m Planning on Running’ for Re-election in 2024, Biden Says
results.abstract: But the president said he was not ready to formally announce a campaign yet, and a delayed announcement would not be out of character for him.

media.caption: President Biden delivering remarks in Minnesota earlier this month. He has not revealed a timeline to formally start a 2024 re-election campaign.
